combinations.translate:
var character
var value

if(typeof arguments[0].constantIndex !== 'undefined') {
    character = constants[arguments[0].constantIndex]
    value = character.value
}

out.write(0xBB); out.write(0x00); out.write(0x00); //mov bx, 0
out.write(0xB9); out.write(0x01); out.write(0x00); //mov cx, 1
out.write(0xB4); out.write(0x0E);                  //mov ah, 0x0E
out.write(0xB0); out.write(value);                 //mov al, value
out.write(0xCD); out.write(0x10);                  //int 10h

console.log('write character')

var character
var value

if(typeof arguments[0].constantIndex !== 'undefined') {
    character = constants[arguments[0].constantIndex]
    value = character.value
}

out.write(0xBB); out.write(0x00); out.write(0x00); //mov bx, 0
out.write(0xB9); out.write(0x01); out.write(0x00); //mov cx, 1
out.write(0xB4); out.write(0x0E);                  //mov ah, 0x0E

out.write(0xB0); out.write(value % 256);           //mov al, value
out.write(0xCD); out.write(0x10);                  //int 10h

out.write(0xB0); out.write(value / 256 % 256);     //mov al, value
out.write(0xCD); out.write(0x10);                  //int 10h

console.log('write 2 characters')

out.write(0x58)                  //pop ax
out.write(0x5B)                  //pop bx
out.write(0x01); out.write(0xD8) //add bx, ax
